Professional Summary
Accomplished, detail-oriented leader with over 15 years of experience in accounting. Â Excellent organizational, analytical, and communication
skills with the proven ability to effectively prioritize complicated tasks and multiple assignments while meeting tight deadlines. Â Creative problem
